Token.Abstract: Removes all targets and actions for a particular event (or events) from an internal dispatch table.
Adds or replaces a target and action for a particular event (or events) to an internal dispatch table.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The target objectâ€”that is, the object to which the action message is sent. If this is nil, the responder chain is searched for an object willing to respond to the action message.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: A selector identifying an action message. It cannot be NULL.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the action message is sent.

Token.Abstract: Adds a block for a particular event (or events) to an internal dispatch table. It will cause a strong reference to @a block.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the action message is sent.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block which is invoked then the action message is sent (cannot be nil). The block is retained.

Token.Abstract: Adds or replaces a block for a particular event (or events) to an internal dispatch table. It will cause a strong reference to @a block.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the action message is sent.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block which is invoked then the action message is sent (cannot be nil). The block is retained.

Token.Abstract: Removes all blocks for a particular event (or events) from an internal dispatch table.

Parameter.Name: controlEvents
Parameter.Abstract: A bitmask specifying the control events for which the action message is sent.
